price: 69. Segolongan Ahli Kitab ingin menyesatkan kamu. Padahal (sesungguhnya), mereka tidak menyesatkan melainkan diri mereka sendiri, tetapi mereka tidak menyadari.
arabic: وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَوۡ يُضِلُّونَكُمۡ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waddat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi law yuḍillūnakum wamā yuḍillūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
